GSD.description:
nvmet-tcp: add bounds check on Transfer Tag

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.75 by commit ec8adf767e1cfa7031f853b8c71ba1963f07df15. For more details please see the references link.
